DataElement.preferredName: Therapeutic Regimen Since Last Treatment Administered Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the therapy regimen was administered since the last treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Therapeutic Procedure Regimen Since Last Treatment Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment._Subsequent to; after._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Treatment Regimen Since Last Therapeutic Procedure Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:Subsequent to; after.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
